WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.

   BY M/V GEO CARIBBEAN TOWING 12 11200 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-02.18S 039-53.65W, 25-28.82S 039-53.60W,
   25-26.78S 042-11.57W, 24-03.40S 042-09.32W,
   24-02.17S 039-53.65W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2790/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 29 SEP 19.
